author: chris2_2_2
content: I’ve always wondered why big cex exchanges aren’t forced to pay yakuza like protection fees to proposers/builders to avoid censorship. Or even prioritization when each pays the same gas and tip but only part of mempool can be included.

author: pieterastra
content:
PBS and Danksharding (which doubles down on builder centralization) still appear to have general consensus, moving full steam ahead.
I don't see a lot of discussion on these downsides, or is it taking place elsewhere?

author: potuz
content: You can voice your concerns here: <https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/sharding-design-with-tight-beacon-and-shard-block-integration-danksharding/8291>
